text: Mediacorp Channel 8 is a television channel in Singapore. It is owned by Mediacorp. The Chinese language channel was launched in 1963. It broadcasts news, dramas and variety shows. It operates 24 hours a day, every day. It used to be SBC 8. The channel shows programs from Singapore, Taiwan and China. Category:Television channels in Asia Category:Singaporean culture
title: Mediacorp Channel 8
